item.title: Funblocker post mortem
item.description:
Long time, no text. I'll try to increase the frequency of my posts and don't give up because of the lack of time and excess of lazyness.

One of my first open source projects with any traction was Funblocker. I wrote about it in other posts, it was a Chrome …
item.dc:creator: Iuri de Silvio

item.title: 24pullrequests post mortem
item.description:
During last december, I attended to 24pullrequests.com, a project to engage people to make one pull request per day until Christmas.

After it, I want to know how much a simple gamification over a common task can improve the results. Yes, I always helped some projects with pull requests …
item.dc:creator: Iuri de Silvio
